name: BIOTONY & SYLVIA against the pandemic [DEMO]
description:
========   LEVEL 1 DEMO =========
Tony is a bio-food rider, and delivers food to the people.
Sylvia has the spray to sanitize the world!
Help Tony & Sylvia to deliver bio-food against the pandemic!
https://www.instagram.com/biotony_the_gameMUSIC BY HIPURFORDERAI
